price: 17 Ne voient-ils pas comment les chameaux ont été créés,
arabic: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: afalā yanẓurūna ilā al-ibili kayfa khuliqat
